channel.title: World object in command?
channel.description:
hey im trying to make a command that add the x,y cords and object id and stuff into worldobjects.cfg
and i my work dont work xD couse im a noob xD so.... could you help?
the command is going to be like this:
::WB posX,posY object_id face height a_wall
::WB 5234,5312 158 -1 0 a_wall
